code:
---
id: auth-metrics-flow
title: "SmartEdify – Auth Metrics Flow"
description: "Instrumentation path for login, refresh, and password recovery metrics across the auth lifecycle."
updated: 2025-02-14
tags: [HealthTech_PatientRecords]
---
flowchart TD
    subgraph Request[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
        L[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
        V[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
        H[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
        T[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
        R[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
    end

    L --> V --> H -->|ok| T --> R
    H -->|fail| F[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]

    subgraph Metrics[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
        MS[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
        MF[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
        MR[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
        MP[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
    end

    R --> MS
    F --> MF

    subgraph Refresh[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
        C[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer] -->|reuse| RU[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
        C -->|clean| NI[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
    end

    T --> C
    RU --> MR
    PS[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine] --> MP

    classDef metric fill:#eef,stroke:#336
    class MS,MF,MR,MP metric
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
